frame.tag: inline-flex items-center px-[10px] h-7 rounded-[9px] bg-[var(--glass-bg)] backdrop-blur-[24px] text-[var(--text-muted)] hover:text-[var(--text-primary)] hover:bg-[var(--glass-hover)] transition-all duration-200 cursor-grab active:cursor-grabbing border border-[var(--border-subtle)] w-fit
frame.body: relative rounded-[12px] overflow-hidden border border-[var(--border-subtle)] shadow-[0_32px_64px_-16px_rgba(0,0,0,0.5)] bg-[var(--glass-bg)]

navBar.nav: relative flex items-center gap-1 p-1 rounded-[16px] backdrop-blur-[32px] bg-[var(--glass-bg)] border border-[var(--border-subtle)]
navBar.item: relative w-16 h-12 flex items-center justify-center rounded-[12px] transition-all duration-200

chat.wrapper: flex flex-col gap-8 w-full relative z-10
chat.inputForm: relative flex items-center bg-[var(--glass-bg)] border border-[var(--border-subtle)] rounded-[14px] transition-all duration-500 ease-premium overflow-hidden
